Reviews.Content: I like the IPad it does a few more things than my Galaxy Tab did. It is kinda pricey but its good.

Reviews.Title: Ended up being cheaper than Apple!
Reviews.Author: B. Ecklund
Reviews.Content: Thanks you guys - for some reason, Apple cancelled my order of 2 ipads and didn't bother to let me know - I was beyond angry and did what I was originally going to do and purchased through Amazon and even though the initial cost is more, I ended up saving by purchasing here!No reason not to purchase your ipad through Amazon - besides, you can get all of the accessories, cases, etc, etc. much more reasonable here on Amazon!

Reviews.Title: What I always wanted
Reviews.Author: Blanca Velazquez
Reviews.Content: This was my Mother's Day gift to myself. I was surprised at how fast it was delivered. It has met all my expectations and more. I say this as I type on my new IPad.

Reviews.Title: At last I got an iPad 4th Generation!
Reviews.Author: Bobbi Matthews
Reviews.Content: I was using a Barnes & Noble Nook Color as my tablet.  What a difference!  I absolutely love my new iPad.  I wish Apple would put Adobe Flash on their units but we'll manage for now.  Also, Apple provides a free version of many apps so you don't have to pay to try something.

Reviews.Title: Who has a problem with this?
Reviews.Author: Joy P Holderread
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad, I use it every day for work and play.  I even took it on my vacation and took some wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Don't know how I ever lived without it!
Reviews.Author: Denise W. Pursifull
Reviews.Content: Love my new Ipad! I take it everywhere I go now! It's like my velcro buddy! I no longer get bored waiting in doctor's offices, restaurants, etc!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: wbcougster
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife... here is her review:  What can I say, it's awesome!  Love the high def resolution! Great for for home videos and pictures. I love iMovie.  So much fun!  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: iPad is fabulous!
Reviews.Author: artizan
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle HD 8.9 as a gift and dislike it from the start.  After I discovered that it had a defect which caused the letters I was entering to change, I sent it back and ordered the iPad 4.  Oh what a difference!!  I had read a lot of reviews on iPad vs. Kindle and thought that Kindle would be fine for my needs but the Apple product is far superior.  I am a big Amazon fan but I would highly recommend iPad 4 w/retina display!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Dennis F. Smallen
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and so far they are great! Wish they were a little cheaper, but you get what you pay for!Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Tonya Bigelow
Reviews.Content: I have two Kindles and didn't know for sure if I would use the iPad, but oh was I wrong!  I love it more and moreas we get to know one another!!  It has been easy to use, just as the Kindle was.  Things are much better andbetter for my eyes and that is a very good thing!  At first it kept slipping out of my hands and then I got smart andput it in the case that I got with the bundle and it is wonderful to use.  I love it and know as I get to know moreabout it, I will only love it more!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Christopher Pipe
Reviews.Content: Overall, very pleased to own the item. Drawbacks: a little heavier than I was expecting. The battery takes a long time to recharge.Hence, 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Ipad still feels best of the tablets
Reviews.Author: M. Green
Reviews.Content: It's surprisingly productive, not just a toy as some have said. Next time I would probably get the version with cell service not just wifi.  There are times, when traveling where it would be better to have all the time Internet connectivity and not have to hunt around for a wifi hotspot. Or definitely purchase mobile hotspot service if you get this model. This model doesn't have built in GPS like cellular model. That means if you plan on using this for GPS on the go, then you must purchase a separate gps to plug in (80-90$) and also pay for mobile wifi. So if you plan to use gps function, might be more cost effective to pay a little more up front for cellular version to save in added cost and inconvenience of hooking up this model for GPS use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Daniel Dziubczynski
Reviews.Content: Had it for over a month and so far it exceeds expectations.  The speed is great, wifi connection good, and the retina display is jaw-droppingly beautiful.  Wish the battery lasted longer but charging it is no problem.  Other thing is my Brother printer isn't a compatible "airprinter", which is a downer, but not a huge deal as I don't need to print directly much.  Web browsing is fun, iMessage replaces texting from my cell phone (saving me $$), and streaming videos is a joy.  This is my first tablet and I couldn't be happier.  Oh yeah, I got the 16gb and it fills up fast.. Do yourself a big favor and get at least 32gb, I wish I did.

Reviews.Title: Best iPad Yet!
Reviews.Author: John Ranelletti
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet with a retina display screen! The larger memory and faster speed are worth the upgrade. Very highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Apple the Best of the Best.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Piedra
Reviews.Content: This iPad, its so wonderful, powerful and amazing. everything is great, the display, the app store, its really strong, and so useful. i love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice improvement from the iPad 2
Reviews.Author: unicorn "ljwachter"
Reviews.Content: I just bought the iPad 4 to replace the iPad 2 since my kids were using the 2 so much and I was tired of hounding them for it.  I'm very happy with the upgrades.  Like with my old iPad I'm basically using it to surf the net, watch streaming videos/podcasts, and read books.  I don't take pictures with it or store music.  I'm also not a gamer - so I can't comment that much on the retina display - but I will say the colors are brighter and I find it easier to read books.  The big difference that I notice is in the processor.  Even with my crappy internet connection I notice a huge improvement in the speed with opening apps and streaming videos.  Battery life is longer than the iPad 2. However, because the battery is bigger on this device it takes a lot longer to charge.  I like to kill the batteries on all my electronic devices before I charge them and from a dead battery to 100% charge on this iPad it took over 8 hours to fully charge.  I wasn't using it when it was charging.  In fact, I read on a couple of review sites that this iPad will continue to charge up to 2 hours after it says it's fully charged.  My advice is to allow yourself extra time and charge it overnight if you can.All in all I'm very happy with it.  Since I carry it with me everywhere I bought the OtterBox Defender Series Case with Screen Protector and Stand for the New iPad (4th Generation), iPad 2 and 3 - Pink Alpenglow for extra protection.  It does add some weight to this tablet but I like the security of knowing it will survive a fall if I drop it.

Reviews.Title: My users love them...
Reviews.Author: James McNeese
Reviews.Content: I have several users that I purchased the new iPad for, and they absolutely love them.  The devices were easy to order and they were delivered on time.  I got them up and running in a very short time!!!

Reviews.Title: Brilliant display and speed.
Reviews.Author: Eran Kemp "Eran S. Kemp"
Reviews.Content: This product is absolutely great.  The display is the best I've ever seen, and the speed is faster than my desktop computer.  The only thing I was not happy with is the PRICE.  However, sometimes you have to pay for advanced quality, and I still think it was worth the expense.  My wife is thrilled with her iPad and not found a hiccup yet.

Reviews.Title: You can not find a better tablet
Reviews.Author: FDupback
Reviews.Content: The IPad still maintains its rank as the best tablet available. I have searched for comparable android tablets, but no one has taken it to the level Apple has. The battery life, countless apps games and things you never knew you needed, including the fabulous retina display make the iPad number one.

Reviews.Title: I'm Lovin This Device
Reviews.Author: L.W. "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I bought this IPAD. My first Ipad.  I have a Kindle Fire and was considering the new Kindle Fire HD.  After reviewing for several days I decided on this IPAD 4.  I really love it.  It is fast...in an area where we still have slow computer speed.  I never used my Kindle for web browsing, it was just too slow.  I use the Apple Ipad to search the web daily.  Friends have told me they stop using their pc's but I don't think I will be able to give up my desktop.  However, I love this Ipad and use it daily.  It is just the right size for me; bright enough I can "see" it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nestor Reynoza "NJ"
Reviews.Content: Where I am from, it was back ordered for too long, and I got a nice deal from here. I have tried  the iPad 2 and 3, and there is not much difference between the 3 and this one, except that it runs cooler, and wifi seems to give less problems.

Reviews.Title: Another perfection by apple
Reviews.Author: Abhi
Reviews.Content: iPad is most elegant gadget I m having in my life so far. Apple is champion when it comes to user interface experience and iPad is no exception. Only small drawback I can see is that not all apps are yet designed to work on iPad though they work perfectly with iPhone.  But that has no relation with quality of iPad itself and hence my rating goes as 5 star

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: Cornelia S. Williams "connie"
Reviews.Content: Don't know what I ever did without my iPad.  I use it everyday and would really hate to have to be without it for any length of time.  It has nearly replaced my computer.

Reviews.Title: We love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: kristin anderson
Reviews.Content: It makes going away easier since we now don't need to lug around computers. Easy to use. Great gift from our family.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad But...
Reviews.Author: RusticBeauty
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad, but this bad boy has some weight on it. When holding it for a short period of time, I have to put down and rest my hands.. Other than that, what's not to love? It's a great tablet. It's fast, colorful, capable and fun. I enjoy it very much!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: M. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: I am still on a learning curve, looking for and finding apps which is why I did not give this a five star rating.  Does not work like a computer and it is hard to make the transition.  But so far so good.  This replaces another table I had purchased which was easily returned to Amazon with no problem (thanks Amazon, your the best!)I believe that once I have everything linked, I will love it more.  Have used it to read a Kindle book and watch a movie but I know there is much more that I can do with it.  Will post more once I have had it a bit longer.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it
Reviews.Author: A. Garza "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: If you're trying to decide between an iPad and a Kindle Fire .. I have both, the iPad is more versatile and you're not stuck with the carousel layout of the Fire. I'm not knocking the Fire it is awesome and perfect for Amazon Prime membership, but as far as versatility and ease of use, go iPad! This vendor shipped in a timely manner, well packaged. Happy buyer.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad. I have had it a few months now and am still learning all the things It/I can do. I was a little apprehensive at first about ordering this on line in stead of the store.It came in perfect condition and arrived early.

Reviews.Title: I love this ipad 4, it just what I like to have, works excellent and response so fast than I aspect. I would strongly recommend.
Reviews.Author: tony guo
Reviews.Content: Also I really appreciated that  "electronicsseller" sent it to me four days before they promised it will take 10 days.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet so far!
Reviews.Author: G1TYSRTS
Reviews.Content: This is the best tablet I have ever had so far. This is actually the first tablet I ever had and love it. It's strong and fast. The screen resolution is too good. It feels like the picture is alive. It suites all my needs, for school and home. I use it for gaming and school work. I just wish all the games were full hd. Other than that, we'll worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: son nguyen
Reviews.Content: it was good, i like it very much, next time i will your items again. Have a nice weekeend. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Phil L.
Reviews.Content: This iPad is great. Super quick with all the features, speed, and memory that I need. And it is small enough to take anywhere.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Danna Thacker
Reviews.Content: it is more than i expected..i can give my desktop a rest..I've had it a couple months now and couldn't do without it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product, solid upgrade from 1st Generation
Reviews.Author: J. Blair
Reviews.Content: This iPad was a replacement for an early iPad.  I have found the changes to be positive and helpful.  After thinking that a camera would have little value I am finding multiple uses for it.  The screen is better although I had no real issue with the Gen 1 Screen.  It seems a bit faster, but, again, I had no real issue with the speed of the earlier model.Overall, good, solid upgrade but no clear "WOW" factor.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: Perfect for me and my family. Buy this product if you have kids especially. My daughters use it for many educational games.

Reviews.Title: Everybody loves this product
Reviews.Author: BARTEK PIWONSKI
Reviews.Content: The best ipad ever  we bought for our toddler She simply LOVE IT Thank you Apple for this amaizing product

Reviews.Title: My First Apple product ( was a from me to me New years Gift!)
Reviews.Author: ~AudioBookaHolic~ "Issy"
Reviews.Content: I Can't Wait till it Gets here!! I know I'm Going to LOVE it!! I checked out a friend of mine's ipad and Had to get one! and of course I had to have the 64gb wifi/4g 4th generation....Might as well get all the Bells and Whistles too! while I'm at it...lolMy ipad came yesterday(1/28) and I was Right I LOVEEEEEEEEEEEE it!! Best purchase I EVER made!!! I love all the AWESOME Features and the Siri app is So Cool the picture Quailty is Excellent all the apps Omgggg!! Love them!! music mags Games Photo booth face time the app store itunes you name it it's got it!! Love! Loveee! Loveeeeee! My ipad!!Oooooh I Forgot the battery Life is Beyond Awesome!!!!!

Reviews.Title: great improvement
Reviews.Author: JFB
Reviews.Content: the ipad 4 is an excellent tablet because. it has great battery life that lastest up to 10 hours or more, screen quality with very clear picture, and good sound thats clear and unmuffled.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy from iPadShop
Reviews.Author: Gsoutien
Reviews.Content: iPad Retina display is great but do NOT buy from iPadShop. Advertised as new but you actually get a refurbished one with expired or almost expired warranty. If you have already bought one from iPadShop, make sure to check its warranty with your device Serial Number.

Reviews.Title: Came with wrong and faulty iPad wall charger
Reviews.Author: Samsudin B. Kamis "sambog"
Reviews.Content: I was excited to purchase iPad4 from Amazon at a great price but felt cheated when problem arises after few days.1. When charging, the touch screen was behaving in a very strange way. I cannot click on the icon and screen just acted very strange. It works fine when NOT charging. I brought to Apple Store since it has 90 days warranty and the staff confirmed that my iPad 4 came with a fake and faulty charger. The text on the charger also indicated 10watts and not the original 12watts. The iPad came in an original packing with USB cable but the wall charger was totally fake. I can feel the different in the material too.2. This was another disappointment for iPad4, it is thicker with bigger battery but it take like 4-5 hours for full charge from 50%. Also, when you use it for very long, the ipad get warm. I tried with different wall chargers (original 12W) and it is the same. The charging seem to take longer than the iPad2.I would stay away from iPad 4 is you are thinking of buying it for retina display.UPDATES: Contacted Amazon and the Seller. They suggested that I return the iPad4. I confirmed with Apple that iPad4 is ok and the charger need replacement. After several email exchanges, Amazon refunded me $19 so I can purchase original wall charger with 12 Watts for my iPad4. Kudos Amazon so I am giving the additional star for great customer service but not the product. Hopefully it charges faster now with 12W.

Reviews.Title: A complete game changer
Reviews.Author: The Endz
Reviews.Content: Gotta be upfront, I thought the ipad was ridiculous when it was first announced. It seemed like a giant iphone and a quick way for Apple to once again cash in. Boy was I wrong.It's been less than a week since I got my iPad and I can't imagine being without it. What prompted the purchase was the need to efficiently and quickly take notes for my job that I could later transform into a memo.  It does that. I then rediscovered my love for comics with my subscription to the marvel app. HBO Go makes being away from home and catching up on some of my favorite shows a regular thing. Heck, I don't have a tv in my bedroom but I can now watch live cable tv via an app and the experience is great. I could go on and on. The kindle app, youtube, amazon prime...the list goes on and on, and its only been one week. I love the thing and couldn't recommend it more.

Reviews.Title: I pad 4
Reviews.Author: Hossamoree
Reviews.Content: One dislike for the charger that get too hot when i charge my ipad , but nothing else , disaponted on charger

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: R. Valdez
Reviews.Content: Another Great product from apple. Good batt life, super display. Syncs seamlessly with other apple products. I would recommend to friend

Reviews.Title: Purchsed
Reviews.Author: Daryl PCooley
Reviews.Content: The I pad purchase was an uneventful operation. The order was filled in a timely fashion and the communication was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Love this IPad!
Reviews.Author: Reviewerthree3103
Reviews.Content: Looks grate, and works magnificently! It is like all the other iPads out there, but more is added to it! Reason for the 4 out of 5 is that the iPad is very expensive, and will evidently need a case when purchased. It is very thin and light weight making it prone to drops. It is however the best tablet I have owned! The display is nice, Siri is very interesting, maps are nice, and the overall speed is great!

Reviews.Title: defective product was resold by Amazon to me
Reviews.Author: Garrick Holmes
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad in May 2013 for my wife.  She began using it in June.  By August it was already giving her trouble - the "slide to unlock" switch was not responding.  The iPad could only be launched by closing and re-opening the magnetic cover I had also bought.Then it began acting weirdly.  It self-launched the Notebook and began printing an endless chain of letters - Fffvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv...  Next it self-launched the FaceTime screen.We took it to an Apple store for repair.  When the technician keyed in the serial number on his own screen, he found that this particular iPad had been manufactured in 2011 AND SOLD IN DECEMBER 2012 - five months before I purchased it !!I can only conclude that the original customer returned it to Amazon, which fraudulently resold it to me as a new iPad without having properly repaired it.Fortunately,  the Apple store replaced it for free.

Reviews.Title: UNRELIABLE
Reviews.Author: LE
Reviews.Content: My wife went on a business trip to south-America visiting companies. She wrote all notes in the iPad. On her way back, the iPad spontaneously showed an error (without doing absolutely anything other than turn it on) "This iPad is disabled" and asked to wait for 45 minutes. After 45 minutes all was gone. It started as if the iPad was new. I went to the iPad store and they said that they don't know why this happened and that they have no way to recover any data. All was lost. The best they could do is to exchange it for a different one. The lost data was worth so much more than the iPad.I think is unacceptable that this tablet may destroy the user's data and according to the Apple store employees, there's nothing wrong with it. If the operating system has a problem, user's data should not be deleted, even if it has to start cold.This is the second iPad we have and the second to fail. The first one, a first generation, just stopped charging and we had to pay Apple to exchange it for a different one.The lesson we learned is that this devices may be good for music, photos or any other unimportant tasks, but to me, they are toys.I wouldn't rely on this tablet on anything important.Update: It did it again. I went to an Apple store and they exchanged it. The employee at Apple said that they never saw this failure before. I hope the replaced unit works fine, but anyway we will just trust the important notes to pen and paper.

Reviews.Title: it's basically an iphone without the phone, not a real computer.
Reviews.Author: Kyung W. Jung
Reviews.Content: I bought into the hype, the ipad hype.  Calling it a "tablet pc" suggests that it is some sort of a real computer but it's not.  The internet you get with this device is the same, incomplete internet you get with your smart phone.  The first "bummer" was when i went to my favorite online gaming site armorgames.com and found out that i couldn't play any of the games because they run on flash player and apple doesn't support it.  so, i went on google to find out how to get flash to work on my ipad.  the eventual answer that i got was that i can't; at least not a flash player that actually works well.  then, i realized that many, many other ipad users desperately want flash to work on their ipad; almost as if ipad users envy those who have flash on their device.  i asked myself, why did i pay nearly $600 for a computer to replace my netbook that doesn't do nearly what the netbook does?  aside from the ipad looking and feeling really "new-age" in my hands, i realized that what i was holding is just a big iphone without the "phone" part.  what i "really" craved was something new and "more" functional than the netbook that i currently have.  i returned the ipad and bought a sleek, powerful ultrabook that has a 15" screen for about $600.Update:  I returned the ultrabook also and got a laptop.  The Vizio ultrabook turned out to be a lemon just like their tv's.  I like having a real, functioning computer.

Reviews.Title: Love my ipad
Reviews.Author: carey dawson
Reviews.Content: I just got my ipad 4 for my bday and love it! The color is great and so easy to use. The camera features are nice.  This is my first ipad and i can't seem to put it down!

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: MikeC
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet for the kids. They can do games and watch Netflix but it is not great for what I need. After being frustrated by its limitations, I purchased the Samsung Note 10.1 and found that I can do so much more on it. I am sure that Apple will catch up someday but for now it is just a toy for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: tezrah
Reviews.Content: User friendly, easy to learn. I bought this when my very old PC desktop started having serious issues. It is now my only computer. No complaints-highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Vanessa R. Lyle
Reviews.Content: I was afraid of buying this because I wanted to buy the Apple Care product protection. After contacting Apple, I was told if the serial number doesn't come back clean, I won't be able to purchase the Apple Care. This was such a good deal I was scared it might not be true, but it was!! The IPAD was originally purchased at Target which is a certified seller of IPads. I was able to purchase my Apple Care just fine and I also saved 200.00 off the retail price of a 128gb! Fantastic deal and I am in love with my IPAD!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!

Reviews.Title: Wife Loves It!
Reviews.Author: RobtheTechGuy
Reviews.Content: As if Apple needs another good review. I was debating between this and the Kindle Fire HDX for a Christmas present for my wife. I got the IPad because it was more functional. Yes the Kindle Fire HDX does Amazon content well but that's about all it does. Go with the IPad, you will love it!

Reviews.Title: Hubby's present
Reviews.Author: LikesComfortGal
Reviews.Content: He loves it !! He had a Kindle Fire and he liked it fine but wanted to be able to do more and the iPad is good for that !!I have one too and don't know what I would do without it !!!

Reviews.Title: Buy the new iPad Air. The 4th gen iPad was great but is now discontinued
Reviews.Author: DK
Reviews.Content: The iPad with Retina (4th gen) was a really nice tablet but it felt very heavy in your hands.  I prefer the full size display rather than the iPad Mini for my own needs, and would certainly recommend the Retina devices.  However, I'm writing this review AFTER the iPad Air was released and I strongly urge you to buy the iPad Air if you are considering a full-size iPad.  The new model is noticeably lighter, thinner and it is nearly 1 inch more narrow.  This change in width makes a huge difference when you thumb-type.

Reviews.Title: Present for the lady of the house.
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: To clarify, my WIFE loves it, I am not an Apple fan, they are too 'elite' for me.  I was concerned that a new OS would be difficult for me to learn and that I would not be able to provide tech support.  However, this device is a breeze to use, my only issue is the combined settings 'app' for all the apps, I am not used to that feature.  Smooth graphics, installs many free programs through the app store, downloaded all the previously bought music from ITunes.  Downloaded iCloud to my Windows computer at home and can sync all her Firefox bookmarks onto the Safari browser.  I even downloaded Netflix, Amazon, Gmail, and Google Maps to deliver content in a more accustomed manner to the lady.  I hope she likes it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Chris Miller
Reviews.Content: Like it a lot. Got it for my ole lady and she loves it. Easy to use. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Aggravated
Reviews.Author: John A. Nunnikhoven "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: I just discovered that this device will not print to my wifi enabled printer a Canon MX882. Now I'm stuck. Throw out a perfectly serviceable printer or set up a Dropbox or Evernote just to print form my laptop. Another major example of the hubris that characterizes so many American manufacturers

Reviews.Title: Still the best
Reviews.Author: Robert Buschkemper
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad and I am convinced (again), after shopping the market, it is the  best value for tablets on the market.  I also own a Kindle Fire and appreciate it, especially for reading do to its size resolution, but for all around versaatility, endurance and apps iPad is my tablet of choice.

Reviews.Title: Why so expensive?
Reviews.Author: Marek Zalewski
Reviews.Content: The iPads work better than most Apple products, but certainly are not worth the exorbitant price. Two good Android tablets can easily be bought for the price of a single iPad. Maybe not as good, but very, very close.Have used my wife's full-size iPad and sort of like it, but my first generation, 7-inch Kindle Fire is almost as capable and much cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Lois H. Gelbert
Reviews.Content: I am unable to give a report because of age and loss of memory because of a stroke.  I was not aware that I would have so much to do to make it enjoyable.  I was hoping to be able to read a book and apply what I have read.  I have the Dummy Book for iPad. It is great reading but I probably have lost far more than I thought I did.  I will not give up because I think it will help me if I can do a few things.

Reviews.Title: Ehh
Reviews.Content: I rate it 3 because, i use to had the itouch second generation and I loved it! It had lots of space! But for my christmas gift I got this iPad. First i was really excited! but then i realizd that you couldnt have much apps, it took AGES for it to be completely charged! and i just dont like it as much as I did with my touch

Reviews.Title: It's all the same
Reviews.Author: Hai Tran
Reviews.Content: I have the first iPad and now the this one and really there isn't that much difference between the two except the retina display. Another thing, if you think you want to use the iPad for your PDF files, think again. It's a lot more trouble just to load the files, not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Never had an iPad before - I love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Page
Reviews.Content: So, this is my first iPad. I had waited and waited until I just couldn't do it anymore! Plus there were so many fellow parents telling me about this great learning app on their iPad for their kids.... My 5 year old son loves it! I put a bunch of games and educational stuff on their and he tools around and really loves it! It is very easy to use, mine arrived nicely packaged and I was able to set it up immediately. I would absolutely recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Joni E. Barker "dimples"
Reviews.Content: Was debating whether to get ipad with phone plan, but glad we got just the wifi ipad. Most places now have wifi, the service plans for iPads are soooo expensive (and of course most wifi is free), and u can download or rent movies that can be watched when no wifi is available (i.e car). Plus u can download a wifi finder so u don't have to HAVE wifi to find places where wifi can be accessed.

Reviews.Title: Recent purchase of Ipad 128GB
Reviews.Author: Robin Breard
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my mother's ipad.  The ipad was delivered a day earlier than expected and in good condition.  The product itself is extremely fast and the transition from the old one was easy!  I have nothing negative to say about this product or this purchase, therefore gave it a 5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: All that I expected.
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: It's all we all know about iPad. Just a slim, elegant, and very great tablet. Apple delivers innovation once again.

Reviews.Title: This was a present and  she loved
Reviews.Author: Jose L. Martinez
Reviews.Content: Buy this for my. Wife at first I  was in dub but now. She like it  special  the camaraderie and the easy access to the web

Reviews.Title: Late is better than never
Reviews.Author: ceisenhauer3
Reviews.Content: It didn't say at the time, but apparently it was back-ordered. So even though it was Amazon Prime, it took 5 or 6 days to get to me. Other than that, everything about it is perfect and brand new. Couldn't love it more

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: MylB
Reviews.Content: Ok - wasn't what I expected... Heavy, hangs up sometimes, not as responsive to stylus as I'd like. Beautiful display though and lots of space!

Reviews.Title: Ok, now I am not going back to my PC ;D
Reviews.Author: marie s
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this purchase and I love the iPad 4. I also love that it is going to save my back while traveling. With the apps that Apple provides, numbers, pages, and Keynote, I can do oh so many things. I am budget minded and this was a big purchase for me. No buyers remorse, just a wonderful piece of equipment that I can see helping me in my work.I can even edit photos and slip them in to my docs just like at home. Now the hours of flight are not wasted but my own personal office.There was a learning curve for me but it has been rather fun. It does help if you have used any of their other products.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Deal Queen :-)
Reviews.Content: My husband really wanted an iPad.  I found this iPad on Amazon for a terrific price compared to anywhere else that I looked.  He is very happy with the product and uses it every day!

Reviews.Title: My Wife Loves It
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a birthday gift for my wife.  She uses it every day, and cannot stop raving about it!  We have Apple laptops and phones, so it allows for everything to sync together.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the iPad
Reviews.Author: D. J. Bell
Reviews.Content: As an owner of a Mac this iPad completes my needs. I can't wait to learn how to use it easily. Apple electronics are the best.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Heather Bowen "Happyfungirl"
Reviews.Content: This iPad is really nice! Takes great pics and I just love it!!! I can do just about anything I could on my laptop!

Reviews.Title: Up to Date with the new IPad
Reviews.Author: M. J. Auten
Reviews.Content: I had the very first iPad and was reluctant to give it up. But once I got this new 4th Generation, I am happy that I did. So many more bells and whistles to play with!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Z
Reviews.Content: My second iPad, the best part about this was the price.  I knew what to expect from the iPad, works consistently, good battery life, but best part was price.  Saved $350 buying this over comparable iPad Air.  I never buy the latest apple product because the last one is almost as good as always deeply discounted.  Also, having the sim chip slot is great, I have unlimited international/domestic data on my work sim and with a great website can build an APN profile and take advantage of that sim in my iPad.

Reviews.Title: This was a wonderful device!
Reviews.Author: L. Jeske
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit to replace the unit that I returned, since this is a much better unit: it has a 1.3 mg pixel camera, versus the previous one that has 0.9 mg pixel front camera, much better suited for skyping. Unfortunately, I had an accident, with this unit being a casualty: I was on a cruise ship and it was accidentally knocked overboard. Not to worry: My insurance took care of it! I bought a replacement one with a white bezel and more storage space(32GB), with which I'm very happy. As noted on another review, the only drawback with the Ipad is that there's no room for expansion of storage space and you cannot just watch any video off line that you want: it has to be compatible with the Ipad. However, there is a workaround to that. watch your videos from a cloud drive such as dropbox (icloud doesn't work)

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Kelley Wicktor
Reviews.Content: I ordered an Apple iPad, and instead I received a Beats Pro headset, I don't know if its just an amazon thing or if its their personal policy but you can't even contact them personally to tell them what happened, all communication is through email which makes it even more difficult to get them to right their mistake, i paid a lot of money on a Birthday present that almost didn't get here and than when it did, it wasn't what i ordered, I won't be buying from this seller again and I'm sure neither will the guy who's missing his headset...!

Reviews.Title: Supper great iPad!!!
Reviews.Author: flipb
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  Everything was in good working order right out of the box.  Amazed at all the features.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Robertjfennjr
Reviews.Content: I had a I-pad 3rd generation and it was stolen by a Thrifty car rental  employee in Key West Airport!! I purchased this and love it. The 4th generation is great. I would recommend  purchasing from Amazon anytime!!

Reviews.Title: The perfect fit
Reviews.Author: Del
Reviews.Content: This IPad has done everything I desired.  It is easy to use and  to download and read books on it which is the main reason I wanted it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Computer
Reviews.Author: James Whipp
Reviews.Content: I bought for my wife and she thinks it is just peachy.  It is replacing her old laptop and she learning how operate it slowly liking more due to it's convenience.

Reviews.Title: Happy with it
Reviews.Author: ROZARIO
Reviews.Content: This is my first ipad, so l dont have anyone else to compare with. By the way, l'm happy with this one. It's easy to use and very addictive... it's perfect to see my pictures and l have downloaded many free app too.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Carole
Reviews.Content: Exactly what we were looking for! No need for the newest model this is wonderful, new in the box, and arrived quickly. Kids couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great, great,....but....
Reviews.Author: Curtis K. Davis
Reviews.Content: Apple items are obviously great, but there is this one thing with the background photo being enlarged to something like 4 times it's original size, which doesn't allow you to get your favorite background in view. Other than that, Apple products are solid.

Reviews.Title: IPad 4th Gen. MD510LL/A
Reviews.Author: Michelle P Ellis
Reviews.Content: Wow, I have had my 1st laptop since 11/13/2006 until it died a silent death in may of last year, and my newest laptop since may of last year is getting heavy to haul around, I love the Retina display, the quick connection to wi-fi way faster than my laptop BTW,the ease of use, and the fact that is really lightweight I really like it very much! WOW.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Benji
Reviews.Content: great product great transaction top notch tecnology  easy to use  great app store  good support when needed  i recomend the drops and spills warranty

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Gregory Thornton
Reviews.Content: It was a birthday gift for our daughter, who tells us that she loves it, is using if for both personal and business (teacher) purposes/

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: Yen Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Nice upgrade to the Ipad series, but still the same thing as an Ipad 3 expect a little faster. If you have the money then go for it.

Reviews.Title: Love but wish it could hold a charge longer.
Reviews.Author: Beth Parker
Reviews.Content: Love this device for traveling. However doesn't seem to hold a charge for more then 5 hours. I bought primarily for use when I travel but couldn't use for entire flights (international)

Reviews.Title: Takes some time to get use to it.
Reviews.Author: vark
Reviews.Content: Takes some time, but learning along the way, it be super if it ( the instructions were written in a manual ) of how to use it, but u got to learn from the internet or good ole fashion experience of using the product.  I do like it, for the cost was a wee bit high.

Reviews.Title: THE PURCHASE OF MY APPLE AIR IPAD
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Denier
Reviews.Content: I am so very  pleased with my Apple ipad. It is everything I've read & heard about &more.; The screen is the perfect size for me and I love the quick start up.They have made a wonderful product which makes  using the internet a breeze..I just wish they would include a users manual with the product because there is so much more to learn about.R.D.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Tablet!
Reviews.Author: David Ellis
Reviews.Content: There is a reason why the apple ipad is rated the #1 tablet.  This product was easy to set up and a full charge lasts a whopping 12 hours.  I am completely delighted in this purchase and I will recommend it to a friend or relative without any hesitation at all. Although there is a learning curve to learn everything this tablet can do, this is undoubtedly the best tablet on the market and there is an endless list of things it is capable of doing. A very user friendly tablet and the retina display is absolutely stunning. As of now, the retina display on this tablet is considered the most stunning, sharpest and crisp display that is possible. I am completely satisfied even though I havent even scratched the surface of what it is capable of doing. Great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: david hamlin
Reviews.Content: Ease of use.  More practical than using my laptop for checking mail and browsing.  Would highly recommend for home or travel.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: betsy
Reviews.Content: Great value and believe me I checked it out. This is my first ipad and it was an easy transits ion!

Reviews.Title: almost like new
Reviews.Author: summer
Reviews.Content: It's renewed and everything works fine...only that it gets hot when used a long time and it charges slowly..I guess it's a general problem with ipad4 then.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Michael White
Reviews.Content: The product was what I expected and functions just as it should. Looking forward to many hours of use, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Shirley Flowers
Reviews.Content: Got my new I Pad Love using it at church and every where I go. It has all the best features I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: apple fan
Reviews.Author: Mary Hill
Reviews.Content: every thing I expected from Apple! Can now use all the apps I have been longing to use!  Love my games!

Reviews.Title: IPad w/retina 4 th Generation
Reviews.Author: Shirley A Jones
Reviews.Content: My Ipad w/ retina Outstanding and picture excellant! Easy to follow.Most of all keep all of the icons inordet. Shirleyj

Reviews.Title: iPad/Retina/4th Gen.
Reviews.Author: OBH
Reviews.Content: It's got every thing I need and the apps work really well that I have installed so far.  Am using the iPad with a wireless "bore scope" and it is wonderful for this use and pictures too.  The weight vs the iPad Air are not an issue for my uses and I didn't need those other extras.

Reviews.Title: Fast, fast, fast
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: I have had an IPad 2 for the past 2 years, which I liked. I decided to upgrade, but did not see any great advantage to getting and IPad Air for the extra bump in money.  We live very rural with no internet access, only the 3G on the iPad. I thought the slow download on the 2 was because of our setting - videos were out, pictures took a long time - so when we got the iPad 4, I was pleasantly surprised!  We can watch videos, download stories and generally just peruse the internet while not putting it down and doing something else while it loads!  The picture is marvelous, clear and sharp!  I did not think that would be so important but does make for good reading.  Overall, very glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Temporary problems with iOS
Reviews.Author: mb
Reviews.Content: This Ipad 4 is my first Apple product. After opening the box and setting my AppleID, I downloaded a few new applications,just to see how everything works. However, I was greatly surprised by noting that none of these applications can beremoved in the usual way (by pressing the icon, waiting for an "x" to appear, etc.). I contacted Apple support; they explainedme how to remove these applications with the help of iTunes on PC. That was OK, but certainly I didn't expect that removingan application should be so complicated. Although the Ipad was declared as being new, I had the impression that somebody used it before and messed the iOS. Being rather disappointed, I start playing with the device for a few days. Not knowing what else to do, I decided to reset the iOS (iOS6 to iOS7). Surprisingly, that was a step that resolved all the problems! The Ipad started working normally, and I don't expect to have similar problems in the future. Nevertheless, such an incorrect behavior of the iOS at the very beginning was frustrating for a device declared as new. Now it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display MD526LL/A (32GB, Wi-Fi + Verizon, White) 4th Generation
Reviews.Author: V. Kulish
Reviews.Content: Like this iPad. Works great, no problems.  Use right now only wi-fi. Fast connection to internet.  Later planning to use cell service from Verizon.  32 GB is good enough for many apps and storage for photos and documents.  This is my 5th iPad.

Reviews.Title: Sure is nice to use a system that works!
Reviews.Author: Sue "Disappointed Reader"
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet. Works well every time. Great battery life. My friend went out and purchased one, but Amazon cheaper than big store!

Reviews.Title: lovin my ipad
Reviews.Author: Heather Kruse
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad... I work from home so wen I need to run errands I always have the internet available at my finger tips..

Reviews.Title: Simple, Functional and dynamic
Reviews.Author: Falcon Villarreal
Reviews.Content: Not much I can say about this product that isn't already known. It is my second purchase of a tablet. When I compare the Android tablet with this Apple OS tablet, Apple blows it out of the water every time.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: jennifer voyles
Reviews.Content: Have had no problems with it, easy to use.  Product came to me on the date expected, still in the plastic.  I am very pleased with this purchase and am looking for one for my husband.

Reviews.Title: i cant put it down
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: i cant put it down! im so happy with this purchase. I wanted one forever and now i have one!

Reviews.Title: It is Apple
Reviews.Author: Assaf Alakeel
Reviews.Content: Great choice from all Ipad's generation. Have almost pest generation of iPad. Same new one with cheap price. Perfect function.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Mr. Bustabuns
Reviews.Content: I am somewhat disappointed with the Ipad.  So far, it refuses to synk with my pc, likely because it is not a Mac.  I have had to use Google Drive to get my files in.  Hopefully it just once of these kink I have to work out.  Other than that, it's a very cook tablet and the while color is especially nice.  On look, 100 out of 10; on functionality, 7 out of 10.

Reviews.Title: I pad 4
Reviews.Author: poncho
Reviews.Content: This was a like new iPad 4 with retina display when it was delivered it looks brand-new and was described exactly it works perfectly I am very happy

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: Domenico Capolupo
Reviews.Content: I am shocked at how well this item works.  I would certainly recommend it to many others.  Great buy for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Preowned and Pristine
Reviews.Author: misty
Reviews.Content: I ordered my package from nextworth and recived a wonderfully clean and undamaged product. Crystal clear retina display and even a 75% charge on the battery.I only give my iPad a four star review because the seller included the wrong charger with my device. I recieved a 30 pin style charger instead of the new lightning cord.  I'm bummed but the contact sheet did have a number that allowed me to report the issue quickly and the customer service was polite and timely about resolving my issue.Great device, good price and a sturdy alternative to the thinner iPad air. There's no reason to buy an air this device processes very quickly and responds brillantly. A normal 64gb iPad will be about $800 newI got my device at half price! Couldn't be happier with my first amazon experience even though it looks like i'll have to wait until monday to fully synch my device.

Reviews.Title: Apple discontinued this device for the crappy 2G
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Fast and seamless.  Excellent battery life.  Awesome app selection.  If you got the skrillz to drop on a device like this, then go for it! You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Best Deal Ever.
Reviews.Author: kbrown
Reviews.Content: Perfect condition.  Love it!!!!!!!!  Works great.  New condition.  Can't believe I got this at such a low price.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Apple hits a home run.
Reviews.Author: Stuart Schiffbauer
Reviews.Content: What can you say, another great Apple product that made Steve Jobs a gazzillionaire.  Good product, easy to operate, vibrant color, just wished it had a usb port.

Reviews.Title: rate
Reviews.Author: Lois Nusberger
Reviews.Content: I love it.I have a lot to learn but have put many things in the note apt so I can review.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished iPad
Reviews.Author: ST
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  Different, if you're not used to Apple but pretty user friendly.  Haven't 100% gotten on to it but think it's going to be pretty cool.  I'm old so it takes a little longer but I'll get there.  Also got a keyboard case and the keyboard works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: So Far So good
Reviews.Author: Jolynn Raymond
Reviews.Content: We like this Ipad. It is pretty easy to get the hang of it, has great screen resolution, and runs as it should 95% of the time. It seems to have issues with a few of the apps, but other than that issue, does what we bought it for,

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Ex Texan
Reviews.Content: This was one of her Christmas presents from me, and she is constantly using it, learning it, etc.  I thought "I did good" a couple of years back when I got her the Nook, but this unit was a "grand slam".  She talks with both our daughters and is learning new things about the unit daily.

Reviews.Title: It works...condition was not as promised.
Reviews.Author: J. bransfield
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad with the understanding the box was damaged.  When I received the iPad the box was damaged, the iPad was scratched and the edges were dented.  From a distance it looked ok, but up close it was not what I expected.  There could have been a warning about the condition of the hardware, but I did not see such a warning.  I little disappointed.

Reviews.Title: I love It!
Reviews.Author: glenda
Reviews.Content: I purchased 128GB iPad a few months back and love it!!! It is so nice having all that extra memory! I am an artist, photographer  and musician....It handles all my needs & then some!

Reviews.Title: Thanks!
Reviews.Author: Michael Mullin
Reviews.Content: The iPad can very well packaged and looked in excellent condition. My only criticisms are probably not related to the seller. The iPad charges extremely slowly compared to my iPhone. The camera on the iPad is really horrible quality.

Reviews.Title: Woks as expected
Reviews.Author: Daniel P. Malaney
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use, but could have come with instructions for those unfamiliar with Apple products.  Slightly heavy to hold.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4th generation
Reviews.Author: R. Kanno "rk4runner"
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my sister and she is amazed by it. I told her to take the free Apple classes that is offered and she is in the process of doing that. She is one happy person.

Reviews.Title: More glitches and crashes
Reviews.Author: B. Stasiak "dr.brittster"
Reviews.Content: I'm convinced people go crazy over apple products solely because of the out of control trend of owning everything apple. Personally, my iPad has crashed and glitches constantly since day one, on an every day basis. I replaced it. Same problem. There are so many better products out there, but somehow the iPad is rated as number one everywhere you go. Sure, the access to apps are nice. But I've had cheap laptops with far less problems, and you could actually use it for more than apps and web browsing. Way over priced.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Blair Stephenson
Reviews.Content: It's not as powerful a processor as the AIR nor as light of course but a fine item to have

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Clay
Reviews.Content: Answered all questions I had and came in just 3 days! iPad I bought no scratches look brand new! 5 Star!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Keven L. Barber
Reviews.Content: Retina Display is great.  Ability to use cellular service when wifi too slow worth it's weight in gold. Great Product!

Reviews.Title: Present for wife
Reviews.Author: LowMetallurgy
Reviews.Content: No complaints here.  Typical Apple reliability, usability, and more importantly, the wife loves it!  Plenty of storage for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Lovelock lovelock!
Reviews.Author: Nancy S. "NancyBookWorm"
Reviews.Content: That sums it up!  This is the best device yet and so I am now Apple-happy.  I tell everyone to buy one over a laptop because it is faster, more easily portable and very user friendly.  The price was comparable, arrived safely on time.  I only use my laptop now for printing jobs (next time we get a wireless printer to use with my iPad) and longer documents.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it....it works awesome and easy to use .....thank you
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: It was perfect. We charged it up and was ready to go, hooked up to internet easily. The wife loves it for how easily she can surf her favorite sites.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: C. Pringle "ga peach"
Reviews.Content: This is our first iPad and we love it. The Retina display is sharp and clear. Love Facetime-ing with our granddaughter. So much easier than other video chat tools we've used in the past. Camera does a very nice job too.  Be aware that the iTunes default is to automatically charge for in-app fees. You may want to disable this immediately as we were warned to do, especially if you have children using it.  We actually disable all stores and only enable them when we need to use them.

Reviews.Title: Better than my Laptop
Reviews.Author: TomPack "Martinsburg"
Reviews.Content: This new iPad is what I now use on a daily basis. I only bring out the laptop for certain connections and viewing. the iPad Air is light, battery life is excellent - 12 hours give or take. Ties into the Wifi quickly and holds. Browser, Siri, Facetime all work very well without any glitches.

Reviews.Title: Nice product.
Reviews.Author: Dale Holtrey
Reviews.Content: I'm used to a PC, so the IPad is a little hard to get used to.  I do like it because it can be kept beside my easy chair, then right up on my lap.  I am glad I bought it.  I like the FaceTime feature, because I can see my grandchildren as I talk to them.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Linda Greenberg "LRG"
Reviews.Content: I have an adroid phone and I was planning on buying an android tablet.  But I didn't like the ones that were already out.  I waited for the Nexus 10 2 - but I am not sure it will every appear.  Buyiing the iPad was a good decision as I have an iMac computer.  I will eventually buy an iPhone.  I have put photo albums on the pad and the pictures look beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my mom
Reviews.Author: MichelleP
Reviews.Content: And she absolutely loves it.  She takes it everywhere and uses the camera for everything.  It's a great product and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Shane Grant
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet. Display is nice and clear and touch screen feature is a plus. Camera function is great and picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: First Ipad and I made the right choice
Reviews.Author: MuddaDatsme
Reviews.Content: I love this Ipad and use it more then my laptop.  This is my first ipad that I have owned and it has not disappointed.  Bought it from an independent seller that gave me an incredible price.ProsFast processorRetina display is amazing and crispBattery life is greatConsNone to date.

Reviews.Title: Nothing better!
Reviews.Author: MacMike
Reviews.Content: It's Apple . . . enough said. They make the best products that are so much better than everyone else's. Seems like no company can come close to stealing anything half as good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Harold Coates "Carguy"
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my wife for her birthday. She has the first edition Ipad and while it works fine, it is several years old and this newer model has many new features and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price, fast shipping, very pleased.
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with this product.  It was in great condition, very easy to use and set up. Good battery life.  Very fast processor.

Reviews.Title: smazing
Reviews.Author: edward alves
Reviews.Content: Ease of use grest product was very please with weight and size will tell friends of this product great vslue

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Nurseontherun
Reviews.Content: Huge capacity, works flawlessly, everywhere!  Used for banking, scanning, kid games, everything!!!!!The colors are amazing. The videos are superb.  What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Cool new gadget
Reviews.Author: Shawn McDanel
Reviews.Content: Came as described.  Great gift for the wife.  Screen is clear and features are easy to use.  Picture is great for watching episodes of shows after they have aired.  Overall, really impressed.

Reviews.Title: I bought two of these for gifts
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased two these iPads for gifts and the people who I gifted them to love them.  My only regret is that I did not keep them myself!  Apple has great products

Reviews.Title: Cool toy
Reviews.Author: Elias M
Reviews.Content: It works fine, only problem I find is that it sometimes crashes when handling very complex apps. For the price this should have been perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: bluezman714
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son a month before the newest I-Pad came out. He loves it and I love it as we Facetime on it. It was better than adding another I-Phone to my plan.

Reviews.Title: Great Ipad
Reviews.Author: V.Auxier
Reviews.Content: This ipad was just what the twin needed. You sold me just what I needed this is a Christmas gift. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad recieved by Cathy Thomas
Reviews.Author: CThomas
Reviews.Content: The packaging was not effective. In shipment the Ipad box was slightly open because it had no celephane around it like it had been previously opened. No bubble wrap on one side of the Ipad. This was a gift so I only hope the ipad was not damaged.

Reviews.Title: The best ever.. Living it
Reviews.Author: Linda Pierman
Reviews.Content: Awesome.  Enjoying it.  Thanks  Have everything on it now and even wifi when I am not home... This is nice.  Loving it a lot.  Thanks for asking

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jossie
Reviews.Content: It's just perfect, it was as expected and as described in the picture. No complains so far. It works great!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Roger L. Kriete
Reviews.Content: My wife will love her ipad. It is just as advertised, and was shipped faster than I requested requested for no extra charge.

Reviews.Title: How can you not like this?
Reviews.Author: Brian Etheridge "brianakabigb"
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about this?  It worked when I powered it on, it does what most apple products do.  It has access to the biggest app store in the known universe.  It's pretty?  I don't really know what else to say about this.  Got a decent deal on it, easy to setup and work with like every other apple product.  It's a really big version of my iPhone which can't make calls.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display MD514LL/A (32GB, Wi-Fi, White) 4th...
Reviews.Author: Tygar
Reviews.Content: Works great.  No issues.  Set up sucked.  Took too long.  I hate the fact that you have to use your credit ## before you can even use the darn thing.  My reason for the four star.  Also sucked that 1 month later, they come on with the new Ipad.

Reviews.Title: This is a must-have internet device
Reviews.Author: Fran
Reviews.Content: The iPad is my go-to device for internet connectivity. It connects seamlessly to the WiFi signals in all of my regular haunts and runs very quickly.  My granddaughters give it a real workout when they visit, playing games and watching Netflicks.It has only one significant flaw in my estimation: While I have a lot of reading material that I access on the iPad, it is not suitable for outdoor or high-light usage - no reading, writing or playing games while the granddaughters play at the park.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a present for my 15 years old niece.  She loves her Apple iPad and says she couldn't live without it, which scares me a little but I suppose it`s the pace of times!

Reviews.Title: a major purchase but worth every penny
Reviews.Author: M.W. "cometqueen"
Reviews.Content: I looked at all the other tablets on the market before making a decision. Not only the retina display being a key factor but the battery life is almost double of anything that I saw out there. This was another major fzctir that I really wanted. I absolutely love It.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: tarheel "srl"
Reviews.Content: Love it, debated between this one and the mini for weeks then once I saw the difference in size and realized I could carry either one around pretty easily, just went with the iPad

Reviews.Title: Apple satisfied
Reviews.Author: Becky John
Reviews.Content: I was always apple skeptical but have loved my apple products.QualityPrice is basically the same regardless where you shop and is pricey!ShippingVery satisfied with this product

Reviews.Title: Pretty sweet
Reviews.Author: James A. Plaisted "Drew Doggy"
Reviews.Content: Pretty cool. I wish it was lighter but only well. Screen is awesome. Battery lasts 10 hours of heavy use.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: I can't believe this thing cost 400 bucks.  Ill never do without it.  You will see that once you have one you will not want anything else.  And it is very well made--durable.  I have dropped it, sat on it, and nothing.  I cant wait for the next one to come out.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4 and more!
Reviews.Author: Mike Phillips
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the Ipad 4, but it was for a friend. After I set it up for her and learning  basic operating skills, I turned it over to her. My kindle is fine for my needs and I recommended that my friend purchase the new Ipad because of reliability and customer service. After checking the reviews on the other pads, I felt the Ipad 4 was worth the purchase and since my friend could afford it, why not?She took a while to navigate around her Ipad and thanks to her gal friend who has the same, she should have many hours of pleasurable usage. Personally, I find it too much for me when my laptop can do all, but there are those who need all the new things and I say enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: judith
Reviews.Content: The display is clear crisp and bright.bought for wife will buy another when the new one comes out hope it is soon

Reviews.Title: iPads for all!
Reviews.Author: D. Larsen
Reviews.Content: This is a great iPad and can make anyone a lot more productive (work) or waste your day away (leisure). There are a lots of apps, and a whole lot of great features to get you going! Love you Siri!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: PAT MCCARTY
Reviews.Content: I love this .. carry it with me to work every day so I can do my homework during lunch.. very clear and the sound is great..

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Eyas Dudin
Reviews.Content: Very nice item at a great price this is an item I've been looking for for a while as a gift for my family.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: jennie "Jennie L Knudson"
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad keeps crashing tho...I have to reset it alot timely delivery and everything else is fine

Reviews.Title: My husband is enjoying it.
Reviews.Author: Steph-chan (kgilbert@parkave.net)
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my husband, to replace an earlier edition iPad. Item arrived promptly and in good condition. The only disappointment was that the iPad Air came out within a couple weeks of the purchase, so it felt like I paid full price for the "old" edition.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Ronald D Boesiger
Reviews.Content: Wonderful way to read magazines, find up to date news and communicate with friends and family! Great battery life too!

Reviews.Title: My lovely iPad
Reviews.Author: Ahmad Mahdi
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a book reader to help me with my study. After long period of searching and trying different products I opt to choose the new iPad with retina display. It's great with all this word carry in meanings. Screen size is just right for everything you want to do with no restrictions. Apps are for everything, games, etc.I don't think there is anything wrong with this guy, love it.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Get Any Better Than This!
Reviews.Author: Helena Ridgell
Reviews.Content: When considering the purchase of the newest iPad, please take the time to compare cost with other sites, such as Apple or eBay. I purchased this item through Amazon because they offered the best price. Also, when purchasing big ticket items like this, make sure to use Amazon Prime. My iPad is mainly for personal use and I'm enjoying every minute of it!  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with it!!!
Reviews.Author: Maria I. Benitez
Reviews.Content: I bought a tablet a few months ago and it was ok but I'm really impressed with my new IPad, I recommend it to everyone who wants to make their work life easier..

Reviews.Title: great unuseful item
Reviews.Author: jarp
Reviews.Content: i wanted to use it to edit my photos on my drive... and is now allowing it. I cannto manage images and videos that are on the network :-(

Reviews.Title: A Terrific Product For Special Needs Children
Reviews.Author: Stasia Nielsen "tiastasia"
Reviews.Content: This was an incredible help for us as a family.  We have a daughter with Autism and although she is high functioning, as any parent of a special needs child knows, life holds many challenges for special needs families.The iPad came in the box ready to go.  I simply plugged it into the wall and the wifi picked up all the tablet needed to know.  This made life easier for me.  It connected right to my iTunes account and I was easily able to share her special apps.We use it mainly to calm her, and direct her with terrific apps such as ChoiceWorks and other learning tools.  She began communicating much better and when we are out, we bring it with the headphones so she can listen to music.  We have noticed a decrease in frustrating meltdowns.I use it often as well, for writing and for other work related things I do that needs a computer on the go.  ALl of my desktop programs have apps that I can access and upload via the iPad.  I truly love it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: ddew
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband to use in our medical office.  It is great -- just occasional issues with the internet browser freezing up, but really a great product.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Ned Pendleton
Reviews.Content: It is a gift to my wife who is being treated for ovarian cancer.  She watches her favorite TV shows (Castle, for one) and plays solitaire during her chemo treatments that can take 4 or 5 hours.  She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Trouble with brightness setting
Reviews.Author: luisjms
Reviews.Content: Not sure if I received a defective Ipad, but the brightness setting frequently become very bright even with the auto brightness switch turned off. For the price paid I am not a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Great product and service.
Reviews.Author: Dan Johnson
Reviews.Content: Got my iPad without being hassled to purchase AppleCare a thousand times, so I'm extremely satisfied.  The product was shipped quickly and accurately and I was offered plenty of assistance online for setup and help.  I would highly recommend the seller of this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice iPad
Reviews.Author: Douglas Rose
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it and I like it when I get to use it.  I think it is what you expect from Apple!

Reviews.Title: good condition
Reviews.Author: yanfei ma

Reviews.Content: The quality of the item exceeded my expectations, honestly. As far the product itself, I really enjoy it everyday. I'm not a basic user. That is, I wasn't looking for a tablet just to surf the internet or listen music like many people do. They look for all these expensive items, and never use all its potential. An iPad is a real powerful tool. You can automate tasks, help you organize yourself, save on text messages, calls, learn through downloadble apps, etc. All this in a single item. If you're looking for a tablet to just surf the internet, listen to music, facebook, just buy something else. The power and potential of the iPad doesn't deserve to be on standby forever.

They refer me to my card providers and the card folks say they don't understand the problem. What good is this wonderful machine if I can't get Itunes to let me use my account?Norman Rhoads

Reviews.Title: The Real Tablet
Reviews.Author: Albert C. Marth "Albert c. Marth"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my I-Pad!  I replaced the Samsung tablet I purchased about 4 months ago.  The Samsung I felt was a good tablet.  I won't say I was anti Apple but I was trying to justify my reasons for buying the Samsung.  I got tired of hearing how good Apple is....how clear the picture is compared to Samsung etc.  so, I purchased an Apple I-pad.  I figured I still have my Samsung.  If I don't like the Apple I will return it and get my money back.After using my Apple for a few weeks now, I am totally sold on this product!  If fact I am considering a total change to Apple for all of my computer needs!  Next it will be a switch from my Dell desktop to the Apple 27 inch desktop.  I have been a Dell customer for approximately 20 years!Apple is a more expensive way to go, but I feel it is the best way for me.  I think Apple products are very much worth the price difference..in my opinion!Why have I strayed somewhat away from the review of the Apple I-pad!  I wanted to express my feelings about a company that I could care less about that changed because of 1 of their products....the Apple iPad with the Retina Display MD511 LL/A (32 GB, Wi -Fi, Black).  If you want total satisfaction with an iPad, the tablet is for you!

Reviews.Title: Great but beware
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: After three attempts I think I finally have a good ipad.  My first one the forward camera stopped working and I had to send it back.  The second one came from the IPADSHOP fulfilled by Amazon and when I checked the warranty it was used and only had 6mo of warranty left.  The box was wrapped in plastic to make it look new but was obviously not the same plastic that comes from the factory.  I have read of others having the same experience with the ipadshop.  So, google apple warranty check and check your serial number to make sure it is a new one. Amazon was great as usual and I had no problems returning the defective one and the used one.  They even waved the shipping on the third because of what happened.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It's the original touch screen tablet. Enough said, right?
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The 4th generation iPad is an iPad - that's enough to get the point across, right? We all know the iPad is the touch screen equivalent of the gold medal - others have come & gone, but it's still what every other tablet is compared to. Regarding this model, the only major difference between the 4th generation & the 3rd is a more powerful processor, but the amazing Retina screen remains the same - & as someone with a 2013 Macbook Air too which doesn't have a Retina display, the Retina screen is quite a difference.  I use my MA more for computing, while the iPad (to me) is more of an entertainment device - & its screen is definitely perfect for it.  Pixelation is all but a thing of the past with this baby!  Overall, I use this for Netflix & YouTube (& occasionally checking email, Facebook, etc.), but really, for a tablet & everything that goes with that, the iPad is everything you could ask for.
