Reviews.Title: Bought to replace Ipad 1st Gen -- Couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: NemesisX20
Reviews.Content: I decided to take the plunge and upgrade from my old and outdated 1st Generation iPad 32 gb. I was a little worried about switching to the 16gb because of less space, but it turns out to be plenty of space since I stream my music (from google player and other services) instead of saving it directly on the device.I use the device primarily for reading, surfing the web, watching videos, and editing pictures and documents. However, since I have started using the new iPad, I use it more than my computer, and for many, many more projects. I've started listing items on eBay right from the device (which works even easier than on the computer, since it has the built-in camera). I also have been using it for many projects that require a lot of typing, as the smart case I purchased makes typing comfortable and easy. I've even started playing more games on it because of the incredible processor inside! Previously, I could only run Angry Birds and Diner Dash, as I knew they wouldn't crash (and heavier games like Infinity Blade crashed the old iPad way too often). Now I can run GTA Vice City while multitasking with eBay and email, and no lag at all!Apple has really outdone itself with this new iPad -- of course, I understand that it isn't worth the plunge if you own an iPad 3. However, if you are like I was--still using the old iPad (or no iPad at all)--this is more than worth the money! Do yourself a favor and get this device!

Reviews.Title: Gave as a gift.
Reviews.Author: Bob Foley
Reviews.Content: Very happy family member received this as a gift.  Great camera upgrade over previous versions. No issues getting up and running.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: FasterMaster "Faster Master"
Reviews.Content: love it, brand new, no issues, would recommend to anyone. Was really scared at first but they came through. No problems. My wife loves it

Reviews.Title: Another Great Apple Product
Reviews.Author: Dr. P. Sindberg "UltimateWines"
Reviews.Content: Got the new iPad because by old one was running out of storage space.  Appreciate the 128GB.  en used for an extended period but not really a problem.  Terrific product.

Reviews.Title: IPad 4 - travelling light and efficient!
Reviews.Author: Irish7
Reviews.Content: LOVE my new iPad.  I've become so addicted that I carry it everwhere (fits in a medium-sized messenger bag with no problem).  I back up to iCloud so I can share ALL my necessary info between my iPhone and my iPad.  I've installed several productivity apps that come very close to replacing the Microsoft products I used on my laptop - and what a difference to routinely carry approximately 2 lbs of technology to and from work instead of the 7.5 lbs of my (13" screen) laptop.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Bacon
Reviews.Content: The fourth or 5th ipad ive ever had. they just keep getting better! Its way faster then the 3rd generation. This is the true retina Ipad

Reviews.Title: Love our new iPad4
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: Upgrade from my iPad3...My wife and I love our iPads and find more and more things to do with them...Tablets are very cool...128GB let's us keep all our music, books, and some movies on the iPad and use it as a source for our Yamaha entertainment system over WiFi.

Reviews.Title: IPAD with room on it...
Reviews.Author: Kusel
Reviews.Content: Can store a lot of pics, vids, games, apps on it and go through your home internet (no 4G bill). Lots of places have free WIFI and it remembers them.

Reviews.Title: Way cool
Reviews.Author: A. K. Zambeck "eye2"
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it.  It was a present for my 7 year old daughter.  She digs it and has become an expert with it.  She's downloaded a lot of free and has a great time.  She even put Skype on it and video chats with grandma and grandpa in Japan.  She can walk around with it and show them what everybody is doing.The only drawback is that she's figured out how to connect to NetFlix.  Now, My Little Pony music can be heard all over the house.  On the up side, the ending theme song for My Little Pony in Japan is done by HKT48 so that is really cool.

Reviews.Title: Really love it!
Reviews.Author: Barry Fence
Reviews.Content: I bought this device *cough* used about 3 months ago. There isn't a single day when it hasn't had use, including a trip to New York and Boston. My previous tablet was the original ASUS Transformer which had started to languish in the corner of my office because of its lack of screen responsiveness.The advantages of the ASUS over the Ipad is the openness of the file system. That's my only gripe with the Ipad (not jailbroken), is that you can't just store files on the device without the use of a specific program. (Ipad users will know what I mean.)The battery life on the Ipad is pretty impressive. With my ASUS, I would have to charge it almost every night, but the Ipad just keeps going and going. That battery capacity comes with a price, much longer charging times.Otherwise, a really amazing device that appeals to all ages.

Reviews.Title: IPAD!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Justified40cal
Reviews.Content: The packaging was very poor for my purchase, but luckily it was in good condition when I picked it up.  The Ipad is awesome and operates very well.  The battery life and charging would be the only thing I would complain about.  Its not to bad on battery life, but recharging takes 5 hours for a full charge.

Reviews.Title: my wife loves it
Reviews.Author: stargazer423
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife for her birthday and she absolutely loves it.  She has an iphone and a kindle hd, but likes the ipad much more.

Reviews.Title: Loved It!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: It is awesome!!! The most fun and use I have ever gotten out of a product. If you are getting this product just for school, get a laptop. Although it is devise that is awesome for the go, it will not replace the functionality of a laptop. On the other hand, if you are looking for something to take notes on, serf the web, watch movies, and do some minor projects on, it is a can't miss.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jose F. Cuesta "sun_moon_yoga"
Reviews.Content: Neat, resolution is great and the speed is fantastic. First tablet and so far so good. If it had office app available I would not use my PC anymore.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Warren
Reviews.Content: I use it mostly as a book and for email. My husband bought a Kindle fire 8.9 after getting the ipad for me. He likes the Kindle because it's more like a computer. The apple has nicer apps tho.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Display and Typical IPAD Functions
Reviews.Author: gsardener
Reviews.Content: The retina display is excellent.  Photo displays are very high quality.  All the rest of the functions are typical for the IPAD tablets.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Thompson
Reviews.Content: I was little worried about purchasing this item on Amazon. However, once I was assured that this product is just like purchasing one from the Apple Store and the price is amazing not to mention the endless accessories; I am glad with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazing display!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "xXS1taXx"
Reviews.Content: As a first time Apple user I absolutely love this product. Great retina display, easy to use, etc. would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Smart4987
Reviews.Content: Great price and great find...works perfectly. I would recommend this product. I am wondering how I ever lived without it!

Reviews.Title: Can't believe I waited so long to purchase this because it's awesome
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Martin "Beths Red Shoes"
Reviews.Content: functional, useable, & already something I can't do without.  LOVE IT!  Glad I bought the larger, 64GB model with Retina Display.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Sérgio
Reviews.Content: i like it this product, i'll go to use this product and i think is very good for my familly

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Dex0269
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife and now I'm ready to get me one.Don't know how we have gone so long without one.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Carol A Bender
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my ipad and plan to keep on enjoying forsome time to come. I wasn't totally thrilled with the supplier butthe product itself is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Susan Page
Reviews.Content: It is even better than I anticipated. My favorite apps work great, "the Blaze", Pinterest and video podcasts. Very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Love the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: I purchased the new Ipad with Retina soley for Golf Instruction purposes, and it has been wonderful. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Merry One
Reviews.Content: I love the ipad. Easy to use, beautiful display, all my apps in one place! This is a great product!

Reviews.Title: Totally Awesome
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: I just love my Ipad 4 64 GB I am so addicted to it, I use it all the time I recently returned it for the wifi with AT&T; so I can have internet access 24/7 no matter where I am whether it's in the car at the park or in a location that is not wifi ready. I love the games I love looking up different things on the internet.  I went two whole weeks without watching tv because the tablet itself is soo entertaining.  I bought books to read on it movies and the clarity of the pictures are awesome I took pictures at my brothers wedding and it came out gorgeous people were saying instead of hiring a photographer they could have hired me. I downloaded some app that frame the pictures and decorated it very nicely.  I just love it. This is my very first tablet and I love it, this is a must have.  I also bought the office word app so I can type, I just have to get my air printer and Im all set don't even use my laptop anymore.

Reviews.Title: This iPad is everything I wanted in a tablet - I hardly use my laptop now!
Reviews.Author: juanita beatty
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this iPad to everyone - you won't regret purchasing the best tablet on the market at all!

Reviews.Title: I just love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Jean Francois Regnard
Reviews.Content: So easy to use. So easy to start using. So fast. So powerful. Such a beautiful object. I hesitated between the Ipad and the Surface (which is probably very good). Yet, I have no intention to have any regret....

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Yooper Red Hatter
Reviews.Content: When I ordered it at midnight Sunday night, I had doubts it would arrive today, March 13, well it did! I have an iPhone so I'm finding it very user friendly! So far: AWESOME!  (I'm still learning & trying different app's!) Thanks Amazon, you still amaze me!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Zoe Covenant Stores
Reviews.Content: The retina display is an added plus. It just makes all your viewing enjoyable.For the video recording, appears to me the resolution below what I expected,or am I missing something?Do I have to change some settings? Overall great product!

Reviews.Title: its great!
Reviews.Author: PB
Reviews.Content: This model shows more capability than the last version which i also have.  love the color...speed and camera.  may get another one later this year.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: C. Misra
Reviews.Content: Superb in every respect.  Best thing I ever brought.  Sold my iPod touch 5g and Sony 42 inch led tv to justify cost and feel I came out ahead.  I like this thing a lot.  Had it a month now.  Likin it more than ever.  Once you go Retina, you can Never go back.  Far as I am concerned, my laptop can sit in that pawnshop til it rots away to nothing.  I'm not sure i can or will eer back to that hunk of garbage.  A 350 dollar hp I bought brand new in auGust 2011, and eighteen months later, one hour of use and it gets hot enough to fry bacon on.  Piece of junk.  Ad I believe it's truly the only time in life I had a problem with electronic item.  Cuz I don't use them too much.  Te ipad has been awesome.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet
Reviews.Author: dlb "blue"
Reviews.Content: We have a fleet of devices, tablets included. The kids need the iPad for school. My husband bought me the new iPad 4, 4th generation with the fastest chip. We have the other brands of tablets in our home too for all of the kids as well as for the 3 of us, my elderly aunt included, so you can choose almost any brand of tablet or device to use. The iPad 4, the only one that is the 4th generation is in constant demand over all of the others, iPads except for the iPad mini, the others,  Samsung is the least popular, the Nexus they will use  and there is another brand I won't name. LOLThe iPad 4 is so fast, remarkably so, the Retina Display is simply picture perfect, the colors do not overwhelm like other brands to with their overly saturated colors. The wifi has the best connection I've had on a mobile device. The App Store makes it even nicer with the wealth of full sized tablet Apps, not stretched out phone apps, along with the ability to watch your movies, listen to your music and use 3rd party apps to access all of your Amazon content. It has Netflix, the Kindle App, Video App from Amazon, so much. I can't find anything to complain about and I don't have anything that I can't find on here to use for fun or for work.It's an A++++++choice for us and the best out there at this time I feelOh Itunes U is a phenomenal addition to any iPad

Reviews.Title: Latest Apple tablet--enough said.
Reviews.Author: Roy, Sr.
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet and am very glad I waited to by it until several generations were available to learn from.  32 GB is VERY sufficent for me for both personal and business uses.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: GUANGBO XIE
Reviews.Content: I have received my new apple ipad with retina display (16G) this morning. sealed very well, it's a new one. I have played with it for about one hour, very good.

Reviews.Title: Excelente herramienta
Reviews.Author: Daniel Camacho
Reviews.Content: El producto es una excelente herramienta diseñada para facilitarle la vida al consumidor, logrando converger hobbies, aministración de correos y redes sociales, todo en uno.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: albert colina
Reviews.Content: 100% recomendado excelente producto, no tengo queja alguna en lo absoluto, muchas gracias por todo, estar pendiente para ofertar proximos productos de ustedes saludos

Reviews.Title: Apple I-Pad with Retina Display 32 GB
Reviews.Author: goltac
Reviews.Content: I love the sharpness of the I-Pad but have yet to find what it can do.  I'm having fun playing with it but need to learn much more.

Reviews.Title: Love the new iPad 4!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Bought one for myself and one for my husband, got them yesterday and setup was super easy.We're both first time tablet and apple users, so still getting used to not being on a laptop for everything.No complaints from us and we anticipate it's going to be awesome as everyone says.Will update later on

Reviews.Title: so glad i waited till now... this device is flawless
Reviews.Author: Sean Maytum "Think different use a Hackintosh"
Reviews.Content: I didn't really want to fall into the apple hype and get the latest, greatest device. but i had seen some amazing demonstrations of what this device can do for both controlling music daws(digital audio workstations) and draw/painting aps with a proper stylus. So i took the plunge. I was not disappointed, but what really amazed me was amazing the web(facebook, internet reading etc...) look on this device. it is crystal clear and so much easier on the eye than my laptop or iphone. it's literally the perfect size. photos look exactly like what they are supposed to look like. I also love this model as it's the "budget" model with the smallest hard drive and no phone service. i just hook it up to wifi and i'm set. Also i don't need a lot hard drive space as i'm not really storing anything on it, just accessing the web.

Reviews.Title: Ipad With Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Jose Alejandro Salazar Salazar
Reviews.Content: Excelente.. Muy buena el Ipad.. Mejor nitidez, mas rapida, muchas mejoras en el iOS 6.. Lo unico es que se calienta un poco mas que el Ipad 2.

Reviews.Title: Quality Tablet
Reviews.Author: Frank C.
Reviews.Content: I love the Android environment but the ipad is still the best tablet you can buy.  ios feels a bit boring and outdated but everything runs so smoothly. Retina display is gorgeous and online browsing with Safari is just the best. And of course the thousands of apps available are a pleasure to use on this tablet.  The build quality of the hardware is unmatched.  There's nothing plasticky about this tablet.  It's just plain solid.  Well worth the $499 I spent on the 16 gb version.

Reviews.Title: IPad Retina Display
Reviews.Author: D. HOFER "Barb"
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad but not my first electronic device. I am enjoying it immensely! It is a little bit of a leaning curve, as I am a long time MS user. But it's coming along and I am enjoying my "new toy".

Reviews.Title: the best product
Reviews.Author: Mindy
Reviews.Content: Brand new sealed in box. i cant put it down.  Fast delivery, cant go wrong in puchasing an ipad its worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A gift for my sister!
Reviews.Author: Warlito
Reviews.Content: I usually go online for shopping and i ran into this beautiful Newest IPAD which is cheap and made my sister happy. All in all I like the product and I will sure shop on this seller again. Very Accurate description.

Reviews.Title: This product is everything that apple says it is
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: The speed is amazing. I have an iPad2. Under the hood, the iPad4 is just amazing at the speed with which it processes everything. If there was a 6 star, it would have earned it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product I love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Rosas
Reviews.Content: I recommend this iPad to anyone who's interested in a tablet. Is amazing all the stuff you can do with it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for multiple uses
Reviews.Author: J. L. Brundage
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our new iPad.  We are able to download numerous applications that are helpful at home and away.  I love the cooking app's that are available as we do a lot of our own cooking when traveling and having recipes available makes it so easy.  It is also very convenient because it's size makes it easy to use around the house, outside when we are enjoying the weather, or if we are traveling.  It is all we hoped for.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase Ever
Reviews.Author: Coleen A. Edwards
Reviews.Content: This tablet is truly the top of the line. Apple's customer service is awesome. This tablet is pricy but worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: Paul "El Lobo"
Reviews.Content: She uses it for multiple purposes including internet, games and more. It was a Christmas present and well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Raschi
Reviews.Content: Great product and love it so far.  Quick shipment and price was right - although I wish I bought the 3G version just to have the option in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Manuel Vargas
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad to replace my son's iPod thinking that I will upgrade his fun and entertainment, but the change only represents a bigger screen, the games I used to use for the iPod, many of them are useless for the iPad, so think twice if you want to chance you device thinking that you will upgrade your stuffs to a bigger screen, because it won't be like this...

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: scarymarysanta
Reviews.Content: I love it, and of course its an apple! the sellers are efficient and fast, and it came like the wind

Reviews.Title: A welcome upgrade
Reviews.Author: Matthew P. Tebussek
Reviews.Content: This is definitely a welcome upgrade to my ipad 2 which hs served me well.  The retina display has twice the pixel density and makes text and pics crystal clear and sharp. Faster processor is nice as well.  If you don't like iOS then this is not for you. Don't listen to the negative reviews if those that do not like apple products. This is a solid piece if hardware from apple. Make sure you do your homework because a lot of the ones listed on here are more than you can buy them for new in the store.  They go for 399 new so don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: Good iPad
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: No scratches and was delivered on time and works great. Partner loves it and see lots of good use out of this like the majority of apple products

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: SLE
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to save money over the iPad air.  It allowed me to update the operating system for free once I synced it up to my computer, so it's just as good as the newer version.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Paulette Lesane
Reviews.Content: I had been meaning to upgrade my iPad to 128GB for some time, but the prices were too high.  I found the best price on Amazon and received the item well before the EDD ( est. del. date).  My overall experience was exactly what I've come to expect from Amazon, Superb!  Thanks for the experience, Paulette.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad
Reviews.Author: Regina M. Shirley
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is the iPad you want. I upgraded from an iPad 2 to this one. Very glad I did.

Reviews.Title: a brand new ipad
Reviews.Author: Haoqi
Reviews.Content: although it's called a used one, but it looks like a brand new one by all means. feel confident to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Acarsess
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a surprise for Christmas gift during the Black Friday promotion. It's a great product and because it came from an authorized Apple dealer, I was able to purchase Apple Care with no problem.  The iPad did not come with a SIM card which I thought it would have.  I contacted the vendor directly and got a response within a few hours of how to get one from AT&T.;  There was no charge for the SIM card.  My husband loves it!

Reviews.Title: Grandson thinks Grandpop is the best for getting him the iPad!
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Curley
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves it. I got him this for Christmas and he has it with him every time he visits. Even takes it to bed. I got the 32GB model, since we learned with the iPod that 16GB doesn't hold much. The resolution on this model is unmatched. I bought it on Amazon cheap enough that I could get a 2 year "Drop N Break" Square Trade warranty, and still had money left over the retail prices.

Reviews.Title: IPad fourth edition
Reviews.Author: Janet R. Showers
Reviews.Content: You sent me a used one as a new one. Full of someone's info. Contacts etc. my grandson who is an IT wiped it clean and I kept it but was very disappointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: Winner
Reviews.Author: Adena
Reviews.Content: Love my iPad, however this need it has to just randomly close out of apps is rather annoying. Other than that the 4th generation was a great cheaper buy for me through Amazon, rather than buying the Air with just not enough differences!

Reviews.Title: IPad Purchase
Reviews.Author: ROBERT B KEMP
Reviews.Content: I already had an iPad but needed one for my wife.  Since I loaded mine up we only needed a slightly less robust unit and this does the trick

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPAD WITH RETINA DISPLAY
Reviews.Author: DIXIE BOYD
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT AND IT WORKS GREAT. LOVE THAT IT COMES IN TWO COLORS ALSO. I WOULD RECOMEND THIS TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad with Fintie Black Folio Leather Cover
Reviews.Author: Sally Howard
Reviews.Content: make sure when you purchase your new ipad that you use square trade protection plan to protect your purchases .  Keep your ipad in the Finte Folio case cover to protect your investment.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: capt gf pears
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 70 year old Mum and she loves it, easy to use and its got the 64gb memory too.

Reviews.Title: Battery runs down way too fast .....
Reviews.Author: Jeff N. Olsen "Seaeye"
Reviews.Content: Using as an alarm clock ... Start with 100% level at bedtime ... Battery dead before morning ... This Less than one week after purchase ...

Reviews.Title: Good but expensive...
Reviews.Author: AUGUSTO FIGUEIREDO "Augusto"
Reviews.Content: Heavier than predecessor. Battery is running fine. GPS is failing more than its predecessor lo locate and mantain the communication with satellites. Still working on that... Expensive and Apple could finally add at least a card reader or an USB port. iTUNES is a "monster" software.

Reviews.Title: Practically useless for your own creative work
Reviews.Author: E. Rabinovich
Reviews.Content: The function of Copy-Paste practically does not work, and I'd like to meet the  inventor of that feature to understand how he/she could seriously offer this invention to the buyer.  No buttons for navigation except deleting, in case of error you cannot put a cursor in the middle of a word to correct it but need to delete and to rewrite the entire word.Great for reading and communication though.Revised on 10-27-13.  Couple days ago we went to an Apple  store to see what we are doing wrong with Copy-Paste.  Nothing wrong, they could not do what I cannot do myself.  this feature is really terrible.

Reviews.Title: I am better than you !
Reviews.Author: David Feingold "@davidfeingold follow for rev...
Reviews.Content: Windows phone and Nexus phones. Nexus 7 tablet. Desktop Windows 8 and Linux servers.If you would have told me that I would own an iPad, I would have laughed, but I got it as a gift, so I'm definitly enjoying this, but first a few things.1) White sucks. Get black, pictures and video pops better.2) Don't just get a Smart Cover, get a smart case, so the back is protected.3) don't download a billion apps and if you enjoy a free app then buy the paid version. (it's only fair)As for the iPad itself.As I said, white wasn't the best choice, but it's still pretty cool. VERY heavy compared to Galaxy, but also feels much better built. The glass is smooth and slippery so it's easy to swipe around. The apps are the same, the only exception being that on Android, I could use 1Password for free and on the iPad they want 16 bucks. Needless to say I will no longer be purchasing from Agile Bits.The rest of the review.Meh.It's a tablet. You don't really need it, but it's cool to have.Oh yeah, it is a finger print magnet and do not use after eating Cheetos.

Reviews.Title: Kids Love them!!!
Reviews.Author: rich daniels
Reviews.Content: I bought two Ipads one daughter going off to the Navy & my other graduating with her Bachelor's Degree going on to get her Masters the Ipads are very nice a little pricey but the resistance to viruses for apple products was the final seller for me.  So far the kids love them and they work as described.  The seller was great and they arrived very quickly!!

Reviews.Title: Good for fun, not for work...
Reviews.Author: Judsiekitty
Reviews.Content: I think this is a good product just not really what I needed it for. It really doesn't do that much more than the iphone except the display is amazing, it takes really really nice pictures, and the sound is much better than an iphone. You really don't need extra speakers unless you are using it to listen to music and have a larger living space.I bought it because I work online and thought it would be nice and compact to work from but better than my iphone. I NEVER work on it. I mean I can check email and all of that but it's just not a laptop. I should have passed on this and gotten one of the thin little laptops instead.Also if you get one, get some kind of warranty and get a cover for it before it even arrives. It's more fragile than the iphone. I did not have a cover on my iphone when I first got it and dropped it a few times and it was fine. I was in the process of looking for a cover for this ipad and dropped it and the screen cracked. It's going to cost me at least $160 to get a new screen. The more protected it is the more places you will take it and the more use you will get out of it. I was at disney world's magic kingdom a few weeks ago and they have this amazing electric show at night. It looked like an ipad commercial. Everyone was holding up their ipads and recording it. But again I would be hesitant to haul it around without sufficient protection.So the graphics are amazing and it's a fun little gadget to watch movies or play games with.Oh I'm also in a few bible studies and the bible app is WAY better than on the iphone and you can also download books on kindle app. I do this with my bible study workbooks and you can fill it the blanks and answer questions and everything. The youtube app looks good.I'm not sure what else to say other than everything works and it's not defective. I just don't have a lot of money for "toys" so I wish I had gone with the laptop.

Reviews.Title: ipad with retina display
Reviews.Author: Fathi Jishi
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my son, so I did not use it my self. All I know is that he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Donating these to a church pre-school program.
Reviews.Author: Cecil Kessler
Reviews.Content: Apple is excellent bridge to from pre-school ages to formal schooling.  There are hundreds of apps for use with the Ipad which help teach pre-shoolers.  Great product.  Great potential.

Reviews.Title: 1st time iPad
Reviews.Author: EC505
Reviews.Content: We love how easy it was to use right out of the box.  Connected immediately to our wireless with minimal setup.  Gets a few hours use every day but only needs a charge after 3 or 4 days. Members of the family who swear they "hate technology" use more than anyone else because it is "so easy".

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this iPad
Reviews.Author: Michelle Burchfield
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his 18th birthday along with a cover/keyboard.  I couldn't have purchased anything better for him to take off to college!

Reviews.Title: iPad/Technology Lover
Reviews.Author: S. Cook "Steel Magnolia"
Reviews.Content: Since I own an iPad 2nd generation (just gave to daughter), iPad Mini, iPhone, iPod, and Kindle Fire, I purchased this larger screen for camera upgrade, and use of DISH Anywhere, HBO GO, etc. for travel/cruising.  Hope the Wi-Fi/AT&T; feature will enable me to use on a cruise in our stateroom and not have to pay exorbitant prices in a "shared" computer room. Now my husband and I both, with our 2 upgraded iPads, can hopefully entertain ourselves when we travel.  Wanted also to have the most current w/128 GB and Wi-Fi + AT&T.;  Love it! However, I still find the data plan and the iCloud data confusing.  When I started this technology "journey," I would have like to have been told that, even after purchasing the product, there are other fees required, which run up the usage bill.Steel MagnoliaBeautiful Smoky Mts.Sevierville, TN

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with iPad!
Reviews.Author: f "f"

Reviews.Title: Still connected to previous owners iCloud.
Reviews.Author: Jennie
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a huge disappointment for me. It arrived extremely fast, which was great, it was in excellent condition for a used iPad. The problem lies in the fact that iPads are not checked to make sure they are no longer connected to the previous owners iCloud account. In the event this happens there is absolutely no way to use the iPad (I tried everything) which makes it a huge disappointment. Especially since this was the second one I purchased (the other was from another seller) that arrived "locked". Although I had a terrible experience with this item customer service was quick, friendly, and I received a full refund as soon as they received the item back. So it could've ended worse I suppose. My daughter had to wait an additional two weeks after her birthday for her iPad (which I purchased new in a store) but everything is ok now.

Reviews.Title: The Air Came Out and I'm Still Thrilled With the One I Have
Reviews.Author: John P. Thiel "John P. Thiel"
Reviews.Content: It's termed the iPad 4 but technically it's the iPad 6.I bought this particular model several months after its release at an AT&T; store in a mall.  They had it in stock, so I was thrilled with the fact that I could walk out of the store on my lunch break with a fully functioning new iPad.  I'm a sucker for picking things up in person, unless it means waiting on a line with people who think they are 'making history' with their purchase, in which case I just have it shipped to me at home or work, most likely from Amazon.This is my first iPad.  I held off on buying one because I'm a film geek and wanted a full HD display.  When Apple came out with the Retina Display, I thought, "That's great, but with a maximum of 64GB it's still just a toy.  I need at least 120GB."  And then they came out with a 128GB model plus a better port and it was time to buy.  All my friends who rushed to buy the first iPad, the iPad 2, and 'The New iPad' as the 3rd generation model was called were definitely jealous; but more important for me was that I got exactly what I wanted.In fact I was so happy with getting exactly what I wanted that when the iPad Air came out, a little faster and lighter than the one I bought, it didn't make a difference to me.  Sure, I'm looking forward to when Apple comes out with what I predict will be a larger, more powerful, fully functioning computer in iPad form--and I'm predicting it will be called the iPad Pro--but even then I'll probably wait until at least the next generation of that model before buying it unless it features the ability to use Final Cut Pro (which no current iPad can do).Will you regret buying this one instead of the iPad Air or waiting for the next model?  I don't think so.  First thing, it's nearly as powerful as the iPad Air, and if you wait for the next model you're going to pay top dollar.  If you wait for the price to drop, then you're going to want the model after that.  And the cycle of suffering on this matter is endless.When you're ready to buy, then buy.  Buy the one you want.  This one versus the Air, personally I think the only significant difference is price, that you're not missing something.  Just make sure to buy it new from an authorized Apple dealer.

Reviews.Title: A gift
Reviews.Author: Jdoggy
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for those that want the simplicity of an apple product without more advanced options for storage.  The display is superb.  I also have an Acer Iconia A700 with a beautiful display but I have to be honest, I love the android OS and the A700 has a great screen but the Apple just looks better in all lighting conditions and the touch response is superb.  Apple has the most apps available and most android apps have an Apple counterpart so you sure can't go wrong there.  My only complaints are not so much on the Ipad but the philosophy behind it, NO easy expansion options.  There are ways to take more movies and music with you using a mobile wifi external USB or card reader such as the EasyACC device but it is more cumbersome than just sliding in a card as I can do with the Acer.  Tablets are a product that many of use are now heavily reliant on. I travel a lot and a laptop was always kind of a pain to lug around.  This Ipad is definitely a high quality item with exceptional battery life and great user experience as long as you factor in the limitations of the minute 16GBs of storage.

Reviews.Title: Keeps restarting, wont stay powered on
Reviews.Author: Jason "Jason"
Reviews.Content: I bought this ipad for my wife and son to use. It is the first apple product to hit our home since the iphone 3 failure we had a few years back. So we got the ipad last night and proceeded to set it up. Everything was fine until we tried to use it. The first app we used caused the ipad to restart. So we tried again. Again 1 min into use and it restarted again. We thought, oh, maybe this thing cant download apps and use them at the same time. If that were the case I would return it for sure and not buy another because that is just ridiculous. Luckily that was not the case. The third time we tried an app we had nothing downloading, updating or anything, and it restarted again. I went to apples site to try to talk to someone about it and when I entered the serial number the site said it was out of warranty and no tech support could be used. That told me that there was an error or I was just sold a used ipad. Since amazon doesn't print the serial numbers on the receipt there is no was for me to prove I bought the ipad that same day. I then spoke to amazon about this and they said since I bought it thru a marketplace person we couldn't exchange it but had to return and buy it over. I thought fine...I will go and do that. Well, while I was on the phone the ipad timed out and went to sleep, but it wouldn't wake back up. So I called apple this morning and spoke to them about it. They told me it is possible the item was used before but there is no way for them to find out. They had me do a hard restart which made it possible for the ipad to turn on again but about 5 min after I hung up with the guy it turned off again and wouldn't turn back on. So I made my mind up. I hard restarted the thing, wiped it clean, and will mail it back Monday. Meanwhile, later today I will go to the apple store and buy one from them, brand new, with warranty. I figure this is apples 2nd strike against me. The only 2 apple items I have own were both defective, so either I have the worst possible luck or apple has fairly low quality standards. If I get a third defective product from them its over.Lesson here....check the serial number on apples site as soon as you get your item.

Reviews.Title: Great, but not a huge leap from iPad2
Reviews.Author: PositiveLogic
Reviews.Content: I own an iPad because it has business apps I use that are best used with a touch screen. One pros side, there's not much I can add to what's already been said. It is great and I'm glad I upgraded from an iPad 2 to iPad 4.But I'm deducting one star for the following reasons:Apple wants to upsell you from the iPad 2 to the iPad 4 mostly on this criteria:1) Siri. There's nothing revolutionary about it. For most it's answers it just spits out Google search results and then you do the rest. People are fascinated by it because it throws a few human-like colloquialisms.2) Retina display. I upgraded from an iPad 2. To quite frank, things do no all of a sudden jump out at you in iPad 4. Yes, I do like it. And it's very nice to be sure. But the Retina Display is just a name someone dreamed up that makes it sound more innovative than it actually us. High resolution is everywhere. It's just that Apple give it a snazzy name and suddenly, it's like the a new invention.3) "A6 is 2x faster than A5" Huh? Reality check. This one is probably where I feel people are misled the most. To me the A5 is noticeably faster and that's nice. But in real life "twice as fast" means 50 mpg vs 25 mph. Or flying from L.A. to Hong Kong in 8 hours instead of 16. To me the speed difference is more like flying from L.A. to Hong Kong in 14 hours instead of 16.All in all, there a lot of hype that used to make the iPad 4 sound like a quantum leap rather than the incremental improvement that it is. Thus we pay more for it.That said, I like it a lot, but mainly for the reasons that people have liked the iPad ever Steve Job unveiled on that big screen behind him...not because of these minor improvements.

Reviews.Title: Worst choice on digital devices I've ever made
Reviews.Author: Xiaotian Le
Reviews.Content: In the past three years as an Android user I always heard, and experienced that iOS is much more fluent, or smooth than Android. However, that's no longer true, at least when comparing iPad 4 to my HTC One. iPad 4 is just as smooth as HTC One, and is still laggy sometimes (For example the frame rate of some animation drops significantly). The screen is a bit yellow, and its overall performance is on a par with HTC One. iPad 4's hardware technically is faster, but no any difference is found on system speed so far. Therefore, iPad has no advantage over HTC One, except the much bigger screen.On the other hand, Android is of course MUCH freer and easier to use. The iOS and iTunes always takes me hours to do something that can just be done in three minutes on Android. (Copying pictures from iPad that was not taken as photos, etc)I was SHOCKED when I found I cannot install an IME or a system tool, cannot customize the system UI or configuration, and even cannot copy files from others' computer without logging into iTunes! These are untolerable. Jailbreak solves some of them, but no jailbreak is available for iPad 4 over 6.13 so far.iPad 4 is just a toy for those who don't want to manage it, but only use it.

Reviews.Title: Only because of jailbrake I can say I like the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Javier Puche
Reviews.Content: Mac products are stylish and well made, but software is a limitation. This is my first mac product since I have an smarth phone with android and a toshiba laptop. Hardware on this Ipad has good performance, it has good quality screen and the processor is fast opeming apps and navigating. What I did not like is all the restrictions that one as an user has when interacting with another brand devices and even with file management. I am tech savy maybe what I am writing is not relevant for other kind of users, but I like to get full use of the things I buy. For example with ipad bluetooth sharing can only be made between mac devices. File management non existant, just media folders, among other things. This is what made me give jailbrake a try. After installing it and experiment all alternative apps it offers I felt l in heaven, now I could say that the Ipad was mine, it was freedom. If it wasnt for cydia I would have sell  the ipad for sure and go to a samsung tablet.

Reviews.Title: Printing
Reviews.Author: Christopher A. Paulsen
Reviews.Content: To print from an Ipad you need a special printer as most printers are incompatible. You must have an air printer and that usually means buying another printer. I would make sure I could print before buying an Ipad and compare it to the printing capabilities of other pads. Also you cannot add memory to the Ipad.For me the Ipad ended up being a game tablet and a device to use for face time only.Many other pads will allow additional memory and printing.

Reviews.Title: Apple control is
Reviews.Author: Iamthatiam
Reviews.Content: .....Not right and to not have the ability to get social media off my computer is like being controlled by the "apple regime":I want to state upfront that the first computer I ever bought  was the apple II gs when apple first made computers and subsequently bought over 29+ computers with windows os due to business compatibility apps. I even set up 1 of laptops for dual os usage--- Linux and windows. I really loved Linux the bests but apps are hard to find. So,after nearly 35 yrs of computer usage,I feel I can objectively rate the apple iOS on my new ipad. I heard,read,and researched info. About apple and thought I should change over after conferring with my husband (senior software engineer) who said apple now has business apps for the professional population. That said: here I am after only one week of owning an iPad and I AM CONSIDERING getting rid of it, the main complaints about windows are: 1) windows 8 2) privacy, 3) the wga genuine harassment (paid a lot of money for msn windows 7 and EVEN with re-doing I'd numbers back and forth --- I constantly got a "not genuine" tag that constantly pops up no matter what I did--- I had been using the same os and upgraded to professional, and after a year, for some reason,it started popping up the WGA harassment!  4) during os scans,Microsoft data,,virus,identifying, LSO ,was the #1 culprit that were "infecting" my computer!  With these 4 windows os  ( there are FAR more) issues , I decided to leave that os. NOW The iPad issues : 1) apple support (for HOW to use this iPad--- not repairs or apps , all of which are general) I am being forced to give the serial number which I know to be a "record" of my personal computer. And NO I am NOT interested in a relationship with apple EVER. Don't I have the right to know how to use this expensive piece of ----- I hadn't even turned it on because I didn't want ios7 automatically downloading on my ipad! And the rep lied and said it wouldn't  and I have full control. Over it not happening. Well, it DID auto download without my permission! Even though it isn't installed, IT Is the manipulative,greedy, way that Apple is controlling over what I want to download . Now,I can't get rid of it,and this nagging update flag is in plain sight on my computer every time I turn it on, this control reeks of dictatorship without any regards to MYRight to use my computer! 2) I didn't buy this iPad for facebook or twitter or ANY social Media at all! Instead of going to the media website and installing it BY MY choice, it is everywhere ---- my settings, shows up in website address bar as I am typing which website I wANT to go to. And if my finger slips on it or I accidentally tap those sites, I get connected or it begins to install itself! This alone disgusts me no END! 3) all software downloads have to come through the apple store---how proprietorial is that! That , too, I didn't know. What I was told was that apple apps are virtually virus free without "bug". So why can't I download the free open office word processor directly from the Internet? Another  dictatorial control of apple. (4) the web browser is awful! No way of setting privacy features such as third party cookies (instead there is an "always" , "never" or when I visit,to always accept all cookies. A site by site "allowable cookie" option is not available. And I can't even get redirects stopped when I do a first party website connection,  No add ons, and I have to remember every time I leave the site or shut down, to have all browser history deleted and cookie deletion. Safari is the ONLY web browser because all other browsers have to go through apple's  exclusive browser and it slows down Internet service. (5) email is not user friendly. It is difficult to have all email sites linked to this feature. In fact, using emails other than gmail,yahoo is almost impossible. I don,t use them at all. (6) having to constantly use a password each and every time I access they apple stop is time consuming and the iPad doesn't allow me to have it automatically saved.Well there's the review.like I said ,i am considering getting rid of my ipad. In fact, I am trying to find a reason (s) to keep it. If I get rid of iPad--- I will use Linux only--- it is extremely popular in  Europe
